name: Hades' Arena
description:
Hades' Arena The Game Show

Come and join the family fun on the all new Game Show featuring everyone's favorite underground hermit - Hades! Watch (and play) as your everyday local heroes and mythological beasts attempt to beat the ultimate challenge - defeating all of Hades. They will fight, they will sweat, but most importantly by far -  they will use sponsor products which keep the showbiz running, baby!

Can you obliterate 30,709 skulls for the glory of Hades?

What's the catch?

Of course there is a catch - you can't win, but it beats pushing a rock up a hill everyday, eh Sisyphus? 

You have to survive as long as you can by destroying the wicked souls of Hades. Gain health by crushing their bones, but stay quick on your feet, lest you be overwhelmed and perished!

Come for the prize, stay for puns.

What do you need to know?

Remember to hold on to your TV remote real tight, it's going to get hot in Hades!
